notes:
Spawns during the [[Bewitched]] [[World Quests|event]]. If they are not killed within 10 minutes, they will disappear.

abilities: {{Ability List| {{Melee|0-55|poison=9}}|{{Ability|Poison Wave|starts from up to 6 hp per turn|element=poisoned}}|{{Healing|range=100-300}} }}
name: Bane Bringer
behaviour: Not very strong or fast. Will rarely heal for more than 200 hp.
location: [[Green Claw Swamp]] underground, near the big witches' cauldron.
strategy: [[Sorcerer]]s and [[Druid]]s should use [[Explosion]] runes while Druids can also use [[Physical Strike]] to attack. [[Knight]]s and [[Paladin]]s should attack using their strongest weaponry and [[Physical Damage|Physical Damaging]] spells.
